item.title: [mh2] Resurgent Belief
item.description:
Sorcery

Suspend 2—{1}{W} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{W} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

Return all enchantment cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. (Aura with nothing to enchant remain in your graveyard.)

item.title: [mh2] Resurgent Belief
item.description:
Sorcery

Suspend 2—{1}{W} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{W} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

Return all enchantment cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. (Aura with nothing to enchant remain in your graveyard.)

item.title: [mh2] Marble Gargoyle
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Gargoyle

Flying

{W}: Marble Gargoyle gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

item.title: [mh2] Lens Flare
item.description:
Instant

Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)

"Lens Flare" deals 5 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

https://twitter.com/Felipez360/status/1399769631993303043

item.title: [mh2] Blossoming Calm
item.description:
Instant

You gain hexproof until your next turn. You gain 2 life.

Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

item.title: [mh2] Necrogoyf
item.description:
Creature — Lhurgoyf

Necrogoyf's power is equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards.

At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player discards a card.

Madness {1}{B}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

item.title: [mh2] Blessed Respite
item.description:
Instant

Target player shuffles their graveyard into their library. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

item.title: [mh2] Glimmer Bairn
item.description:
Creature — Ouphe

Sacrifice a token: Glimmer Bairn gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WckVBeD79sI

item.title: [mh2] Resurgent Belief
item.description:
Sorcery

Suspend 2—{1}{W} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{W} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

Return all enchantment cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. (Aura with nothing to enchant remain in your graveyard.)

item.title: [mh2] Arcbound Prototype
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Assembly-Worker

Modular 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)

item.title: [mh2] Disciple of the Sun
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

Lifelink

When Disciple of the Sun enters the battlefield, return target permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [mh2] Fairgrounds Patrol
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

{1}{W}, Exile Fairgrounds Patrol from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter creature token with flying. Activate only as a sorcery.

item.title: [mh2] Guardian Kirin
item.description:
Creature — Kirin

Flying

Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Guardian Kirin.

item.title: [mh2] Knighted Myr
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Myr Knight

{2}{W}: Adapt 1. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on Knighted Myr, it gains double strike until end of turn.

item.title: [mh2] Marble Gargoyle
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Gargoyle

Flying

{W}: Marble Gargoyle gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

item.title: [mh2] Piercing Rays
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile target tapped creature.

Forecast—{2}{W}, Reveal Piercing Rays from your hand: Tap target untapped creature. (Activate only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)

item.title: [mh2] Soul of Migration
item.description:
Creature — Elemental

Flying

When Soul of Migration enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Bird creature tokens with flying.

Evoke {3}{W} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

item.title: [mh2] Burdened Aerialist
item.description:
Creature — Human Pirate

When Burdened Aerialist enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

Whenever you sacrifice a token, Burdened Aerialist gains flying until end of turn.

item.title: [mh2] Etherium Spinner
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Human Wizard

Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 4 or greater, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

item.title: [mh2] Foul Watcher
item.description:
Creature — Nightmare Bird

Flying

When Foul Watcher enters the battlefield, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)

Delirium — Foul Watcher gets +1/+0 as long as there are four more card types among cards in your graveyard.

item.title: [mh2] Parcel Myr
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Clue Myr

{2}, Sacrifice Parcel Myr: Draw a card.

item.title: [mh2] Recalibrate
item.description:
Instant

Return target creature to its owner's hand. If you've discarded a card this turn, draw a card.

item.title: [mh2] Cabal Initiate
item.description:
Creature — Human Warlock

Discard a card: Cabal Initiate gains lifelink until end of turn.

Threshold — Cabal Initiate get +1/+2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

item.title: [mh2] Gilt-Blade Prowler
item.description:
Creature — Human Rogue

{1}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Draw a card. Activate only if you've discarded a card this turn.

item.title: [mh2] Hell Mongrel
item.description:
Creature — Nightmare Dog

Discard a card: Hell Mongrel gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Madness {2}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

item.title: [mh2] Loathsome Curator
item.description:
Creature — Gorgon Wizard

Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)

Menace

When Loathsome Curator exploits a creature, destroy target creature you don't control with mana value 3 or less.

item.title: [mh2] Nested Shambler
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

When Nested Shambler dies, create X tapped 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens, where X is Nested Shambler's power.

item.title: [mh2] Tizerus Charger
item.description:
Creature — Pegasus

Escape—{4}{B}, Exile five other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)

Tizerus Charger escapes with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or a flying counter on it.

item.title: [mh2] Tragic Fall
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

Hellbent — That creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn instead if you have no cards in hand.

item.title: [mh2] Vermin Gorger
item.description:
Creature — Vampire

{T}, Sacrifice another creature: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

item.title: [mh2] Arcbound Tracker
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Dog

Menace

Modular 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)

Whenever you cast a spell other than your first spell each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Arcbound Tracker.

item.title: [mh2] Gouged Zealot
item.description:
Creature — Cyclops Berserker

Reach

Delirium — Whenever Gouged Zealot attacks, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, Gouged Zealot deals 1 damage to each creature defending player controls.

Magmatic Sinkhole deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

item.description:
Enchantment
